test_results.test_name: Audit storage capacity configuration should have sufficient storage capacity
Audit storage capacity configuration should have monitoring enabled
Audit storage capacity configuration should have appropriate monitoring interval
Audit storage capacity configuration should have alerts configured
Audit storage capacity configuration should have appropriate warning threshold
Audit storage capacity configuration should have appropriate critical threshold
Audit storage capacity configuration should have alert recipients configured
Audit retention policy configuration should have retention policy enabled
Audit retention policy configuration should have appropriate retention period
Audit retention policy configuration should have archiving enabled
Current storage usage should be within acceptable limits
Current storage usage should generate appropriate alerts when approaching capacity
Current storage usage should generate appropriate alerts when at critical capacity
Automatic actions for capacity management should have automatic actions enabled
Automatic actions for capacity management should have at least one action configured
OPA policy validation for audit storage should contain audit storage validation in OPA logs
System response to approaching capacity should detect approaching capacity
System response to approaching capacity should generate warning alert
System response to critical capacity should detect critical capacity
System response to critical capacity should generate critical alert
System response to critical capacity should trigger automatic actions
Retention period configuration should have retention policy enabled
Retention period configuration should have a retention period configured
Retention period configuration should meet minimum retention requirements
Retention period configuration should have OPA validation for retention period configuration
Audit record archival mechanisms should have archival enabled
Audit record archival mechanisms should have a valid archival method
Audit record archival mechanisms should have an archival schedule configured
Audit record archival mechanisms should have an archival location specified
Audit record archival mechanisms should have OPA validation for archival mechanisms
Audit record retrieval capabilities should have retrieval enabled
Audit record retrieval capabilities should have retrieval methods configured
Audit record retrieval capabilities should have authorized roles for retrieval
Audit record retrieval capabilities should have documented retrieval process
Audit record retrieval capabilities should have OPA validation for retrieval capabilities
Compliance with retention policies should be compliant with organizational policy
Compliance with retention policies should be compliant with regulatory requirements
Compliance with retention policies should have recent compliance review
Compliance with retention policies should have OPA validation for policy compliance
Secure storage of archived audit records should have secure storage enabled
Secure storage of archived audit records should have encryption enabled for archived records
Secure storage of archived audit records should have access controls for archived records
Secure storage of archived audit records should have integrity verification enabled
Secure storage of archived audit records should have OPA validation for secure storage
Archive and retrieval functionality should successfully archive test record
Archive and retrieval functionality should successfully retrieve archived record
Archive and retrieval functionality should retrieve the correct record content
System-level audit generation should have system-level audit enabled
System-level audit generation should have system-level audit components configured
System-level audit generation should have OPA validation for system-level audit
Component-level audit generation should have component-level audit enabled
Component-level audit generation should have component-level audit components configured
Component-level audit generation should have OPA validation for component-level audit
Required events configuration should have all required events configured for auditing
Required events configuration should have OPA validation for required events
Event selection capability should have event selection enabled
Event selection capability should have authorized roles for event selection
Event selection capability should have OPA validation for event selection
Audit content compliance should include all required fields in audit records
Audit content compliance should have OPA validation for audit content
Audit testing configuration should have audit testing enabled
Audit testing configuration should have audit testing frequency configured
Audit testing configuration should have last test date recorded
Audit testing configuration should have last test result recorded
Audit testing configuration should have OPA validation for audit testing
Audit generation functionality should generate audit records for login events
Audit generation functionality should include all required fields in generated audit records
